short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sync tweets from Twitter to Bluesky

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Save your tweets locally and repost on bluesky, to avoid safety issue, the extension only do "save" and "put saved data to your bsky editor", no API used, only do copy paste with three clicks.

Step1: Click the sync button under your own tweets.
Step2: Click the icon of the extension to check your saved tweets.
Step3: Switch to Bsky, click "post to bluesky" under your saved tweets to put the content into bsky editor.
Step3: Check the content in your bsky editor before you publish.
